options.content:
# Session History & Cost Summaries
Data from Tesla Fleet API for all Wall Connectors. Supply costs from hourly pricing, full costs include delivery (~${delivery_rate}¢/kWh).

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "supply_cost_dollars")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Total Supply Cost
panels.description: Total cost based on hourly supply rates only

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "full_cost_dollars")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Total Full Cost (Est.)
panels.description: Total estimated cost including delivery charges

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg_price_cents")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

panels.title: Avg Supply Price
panels.description: Average supply price across all sessions

targets.query:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "duration_hours")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "supply_cost_dollars" or r._field == "full_cost_dollars")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name != "unknown")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> group(columns: ["unit_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "unit_name"])

properties.value: Average supply price during session (excludes delivery)
Cost using hourly supply rate only
Total cost including supply + delivery + capacity + taxes

targets.query:
import "date"
import "strings"

data = from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name != "unknown")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      "Time": strings.substring(v: string(v: r._time), start: 0, end: 16),
      "Unit": r.unit_name,
      "Vehicle": r.vehicle_name,
      "Duration": string(v: int(v: r.duration_min)) + " min",
      "Energy": r.energy_kwh,
      "Avg Power": r.avg_power_kw,
      "Avg Price": r.avg_price_cents,
      "Supply Cost": r.supply_cost_dollars,
      "Full Cost": r.full_cost_dollars
  }))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["Time"], desc: true)

data

panels.title: Session History
panels.description: All recorded charging sessions with cost details. Supply Cost = hourly pricing only. Full Cost = supply + delivery/capacity/taxes.

targets.query:
import "date"

data = from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name != "unknown")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.supply_cost_dollars and exists r.full_cost_dollars)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      week_start: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1w)
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["week_start"])
  |> reduce(
      identity: {sessions: 0, energy: 0.0, supply_cost: 0.0, full_cost: 0.0, price_sum: 0.0},
      fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
          sessions: accumulator.sessions + 1,
          energy: accumulator.energy + r.energy_kwh,
          supply_cost: accumulator.supply_cost + r.supply_cost_dollars,
          full_cost: accumulator.full_cost + r.full_cost_dollars,
          price_sum: accumulator.price_sum + r.avg_price_cents
      })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      "Week": string(v: r.week_start),
      "Sessions": r.sessions,
      "Energy (kWh)": r.energy,
      "Avg Rate (¢)": r.price_sum / float(v: r.sessions),
      "Supply Cost": r.supply_cost,
      "Full Cost": r.full_cost
  }))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["Week"], desc: true)

data

import "date"

data = from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name != "unknown")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit_name =~ /${unit_name}/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.vehicle_name =~ /${vehicle_name}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.supply_cost_dollars and exists r.full_cost_dollars)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      month_start: date.truncate(t: r._time, unit: 1mo)
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["month_start"])
  |> reduce(
      identity: {sessions: 0, energy: 0.0, supply_cost: 0.0, full_cost: 0.0, price_sum: 0.0},
      fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
          sessions: accumulator.sessions + 1,
          energy: accumulator.energy + r.energy_kwh,
          supply_cost: accumulator.supply_cost + r.supply_cost_dollars,
          full_cost: accumulator.full_cost + r.full_cost_dollars,
          price_sum: accumulator.price_sum + r.avg_price_cents
      })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      "Month": string(v: r.month_start),
      "Sessions": r.sessions,
      "Energy (kWh)": r.energy,
      "Avg Rate (¢)": r.price_sum / float(v: r.sessions),
      "Supply Cost": r.supply_cost,
      "Full Cost": r.full_cost
  }))
  |> group()
  |> sort(columns: ["Month"], desc: true)

data

list.definition:
from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> keep(columns: ["unit_name"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "unit_name")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"])
list.label: Unit
list.name: unit_name

list.label: Vehicle
list.name: vehicle_name

from(bucket: "twc_dashboard")
  |> range(start: -30d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "fleet_charge_session")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "energy_kwh")
  |> keep(columns: ["vehicle_name"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "vehicle_name")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"])

list.description: Delivery + capacity + taxes per kWh (calculate from your bills)
list.label: Delivery ¢/kWh
list.name: delivery_rate
